#This app is called Smart party app
#Its used to manage events such as weedidng e.t.c
#Event owner can upload guestlist
#Event owner can upload budget
#Guests can pledge and pay pledges via mobile money
#Next arnivasary generated by app and many other tasks app sends sms
#i had done this app in html5 and php core coded with out a framework
#Now am rebuilding the app using laravel
